text: The Crown of the Russian Empire, or Once Again the Elusive Avengers () is a 1971 Soviet action movie directed by Edmond Keosayan.Музей кино открывает программу летних кинопоказов на ВДНХКОРОНА РОССИЙСКОЙ ИМПЕРИИ, ИЛИ СНОВА НЕУЛОВИМЫЕ (1970-1971) It stars Viktor Kosykh, Valentina Kurdyukova, and Vasiliy Vasilev. ==Actors== * Viktor Kosykh - Danka Shchus * Valentina Kurdyukova - Ksanka Shchus * Vasiliy Vasilev - Yashka the Gypsy * Michael Metyolkin - Valerka Meshcheryakov * Ivan Pereverzev - Smirnov, department head of Cheka == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian action movies Category:Russian comedy movies Category:1971 action movies Category:1971 comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Edmond Keosayan
title: The Crown of the Russian Empire, or Once Again the Elusive Avengers
